(촀\0Never saw the point of makin' some
kinda plan for the comin' year.
\0\0\0()촀\0Been around long enough to know
there ain't no plannin' for all the
wild curves life has in store for you.

()촀\0Some people give gifts at the start of a new yearn\0\0 (촀\0Nice idea, I reckon.
\0\0\0(촀\0Wonder how they choose what
to give? 
\0What gift says "Z\0"?

()촀\0Gonna start Z\0 by fixin' myself
a big pot of my new-year stew!
\0\0\0(촀\0Ain't exactly a good cook, but
stew's easy enough to make,
(촀\0and there's always leftovers!

So, n\0,
\0 (&촀\0set any goals
for yourself for the comin' year?\0\0(촀\0Don't really have any of my own.
\0
(촀\0\0Besides cuttin' back on sweets
\0n\0\0\0￿

Guess it's time we (촀\0switched over to
a new calendarn\0\0 (9촀\0It's hard, pickin'
a theme worth lookin' at all year.
\0
(촀\0Do I want somethin' with twelve
months of scenery, 
\0or one that's
got a joke for every new month?
